sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON APRIL 20, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TO THE STOCKHOLDERS OF INTUITIVE SURGICAL, INC.:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice is hereby given that the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders (the Annual Meeting) of Intuitive Surgical, Inc. (Intuitive Surgical or the Company) will be held at 1020 Kifer Road, Sunnyvale, California 94086 on Thursday, April 20, 2017, at 3:00 p.m., Pacific Daylight Time, for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to elect nine members to the Board of Directors of the Company to serve until the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders (Proposal No. 1);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to consider and approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of the Company's Named Executive Officers as disclosed in the Proxy Statement (NEOs) (Proposal No. 2);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to vote, on an advisory basis, on the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation of the Company's Named Executive Officers as disclosed in the Proxy Statement (Proposal No. 3);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC) as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017 (Proposal No. 4);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to approve the amendment and restatement of the 2000 Employee Stock Purchase Plan (Proposal No. 5
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to approve the amendment and restatement of the 2010 Incentive Award Plan (Proposal No. 6); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to transact any other business which is properly brought before the Annual Meeting or adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders of record at the close of business on February 24, 2017, are entitled to notice of, and to vote at, the Annual Meeting or any adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to continue to take advantage of the Securities and Exchange Commission (the SEC) rules that allow us to furnish our proxy materials to our stockholders by providing access to such documents on the Internet instead of mailing printed copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, most of our stockholders will receive a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice) instead of a paper copy of this Proxy Statement and our 2016 Annual Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notices are being mailed to stockholders starting on or about March 10, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that this process allows us to provide our stockholders with the information they need in a more timely manner, while reducing the environmental impact and the costs incurred by us in printing and mailing the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice contains instructions on how to access those documents over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice also contains instructions on how to request a copy of our proxy materials, including the attached Proxy Statement, our 2016 Annual Report and a form of proxy card or voting instruction card, electronically by email.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you are able to attend the Annual Meeting in person, it is important that your shares be represented.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote as soon as possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of our Board of Directors, thank you for your participation in this important annual process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: /s/ Gary S. Guthart, Ph.D.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gary S. Guthart, Ph.D.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: President and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sunnyvale, California March 3, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that attendance at the Annual Meeting will be limited to stockholders as of the record date, or their authorized representatives, and guests of Intuitive Surgical.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INTUITIVE SURGICAL, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT FOR 2017 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why am I receiving these materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors (the Board) has made these materials available to you on the Internet, or has delivered printed versions of these materials to you by mail, in connection with the solicitation of proxies to be voted at our Annual Meeting of Stockholders to be held on April 20, 2017, at 3:00 p.m., Pacific Daylight Time, at the location and for the purposes as set forth in the Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our stockholders are invited to attend the Annual Meeting and are requested to vote on the proposals described in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The approximate date on which this Proxy Statement and form of proxy will be first sent and made available to stockholders is March 10, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is included in these materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These materials include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement for the Annual Meeting; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders, which includes our audited consolidated financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received printed versions of these materials by mail, these materials also include the proxy card or voting instruction form or the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What items will be voted on at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will be voting for the following proposals:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. The election of nine members to the Board to serve until the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders (Proposal No. 1);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. The advisory approval of the compensation of the Company's Named Executive Officers (Proposal No. 2);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. The advisory vote on the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation of the Company's Named Executive Officers (Proposal No. 3);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. The ratification of the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC) as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017 (Proposal No. 4);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. The approval of the amendment and restatement of the 2000 Employee Stock Purchase Plan (Proposal No. 5); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. The approval of the amendment and restatement of the 2010 Incentive Award Plan (Proposal No. 6).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What are the Boards voting recommendations?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends that you vote your shares:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the election of each of the nominees to the Board (Proposal No. 1);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of the compensation of the Companys Named Executive Officers (Proposal No. 2);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONE YEAR for the advisory vote on the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation of the Companys Named Executive Officers (Proposal No. 3);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the ratification of the appointment of PwC as the Companys independent registered accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017 (Proposal No. 4);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval of the amendment and restatement of the 2000 Employee Stock Purchase Plan (Proposal No. 5); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval of the amendment and restatement of the 2010 Incentive Award Plan (Proposal No. 6).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where are Intuitive Surgicals principal executive offices located, and what is Intuitive Surgicals main telephone num
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our principal executive offices are located at 1020 Kifer Road, Sunnyvale, California 94086, and our main telephone number is (408) 523-2100.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive a notice in the mail regarding the Internet availability of proxy materials instead of a full set of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to continue to take advantage of the SEC rules that allow us to furnish our proxy materials to our stockholders by providing access to such documents on the Internet instead of mailing printed copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, most of our stockholders of record and beneficial owners have received a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials ("Notice") and will not receive a full set of proxy materials in the mail unless requested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to access the proxy materials on the Internet may be found on the website referred to in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to receive our proxy materials electronically by email, you should follow the instructions for requesting such materials provided in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your election to receive proxy materials electronically by email will remain in effect until you terminate such election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Choosing to receive future proxy materials electronically by email will reduce the environmental impact and the costs incurred by us in printing and mailing the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I get electronic access to the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered and Beneficial Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can view the proxy materials for the Annual Meeting on the Internet at www.envisionreports.com/ISRG.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who may vote at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors set February 24, 2017, as the record date for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders of record who owned Intuitive Surgical common stock at the close of business on February 24, 2017, are entitled to receive notice of, to attend, and to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of the Intuitive Surgical common stock has one vote on each matter, and there is no cumulative voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the close of business on the record date, there were 36,725,491 shares of common stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between a stockholder of record and a beneficial owner of shares held in street name?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder of Record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name with the Companys transfer agent, Computershare Investor Services, LLC (Computershare), you are considered the stockholder of record with respect to those shares, and the Notice was sent directly to you by the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you request printed copies of the proxy materials, you will receive a proxy card by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owner of Shares Held in Street Name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in an account at a brokerage firm, bank, broker-dealer, or other similar organization, then you are the beneficial owner of shares held in street name, and the Notice is forwarded to you by that organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The organization holding your account is considered the stockholder of record for purposes of voting at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a beneficial owner, you have the right to instruct that organization on how to vote the shares held in your account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you request printed copies of the proxy materials, you will receive a voting instruction form by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I vote my shares?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In Person  If you are a stockholder of record, you may vote in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in a brokerage account or by another nominee or trustee, you are considered the beneficial owner of shares held in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner, you are also invited to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since a beneficial owner is not the stockholder of record, you may not vote these shares in person at the Annual Meeting unless you obtain a legal proxy from the organization that holds your shares, giving you the right to vote the shares at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Via the Internet  You may vote by proxy via the Internet by visiting www.investorvote.com/ISRG for stockholders of record and www.proxyvote.com for beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Telephone  If you requested printed copies of the proxy materials by mail, you may vote by proxy by calling the toll free number found on the voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Mail  If you requested printed copies of the proxy materials by mail, and if you are a stockholder of record, you may also vote by proxy by filling out the proxy card and sending it back in the envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you requested printed copies of the proxy materials by mail and you are a beneficial owner, you may vote by proxy by filling out the voting instruction form and sending it back in the envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the quorum requirement for the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The holders of a majority of the shares entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting must be present at the Annual Meeting for the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: transaction of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is called a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares will be counted for purposes of determining if there is a quorum, whether representing votes for, against, or abstained, if you:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: are present and vote in person at the Annual Meeting; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: have voted on the Internet, by telephone or by properly submitting a proxy card or voting instruction form by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes will also be counted as present and entitled to vote for purposes of determining if there is a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a quorum is not present, the Annual Meeting will be adjourned until a quorum is obtained.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are proxies voted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares represented by valid proxies received prior to the Annual Meeting will be voted and, where a stockholder specifies by means of the proxy a choice with respect to any matter to be acted upon, the shares will be voted in accordance with the stockholders instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if I do not give specific voting instructions?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of Record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record and you:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: indicate when voting on the Internet or by telephone that you wish to vote as recommended by the Board, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: sign and return a proxy card without giving specific voting instructions,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: then the proxy holders will vote your shares in the manner recommended by the Board on all matters presented in this Proxy Statement and as the proxy holders may determine in their discretion with respect to any other matters properly presented for a vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owners of Shares Held in Street Name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares held in street name and do not provide the organization that holds your shares with specific voting instructions, under the rules of various national and regional securities exchanges, the organization that holds your shares may generally vote on routine matters but cannot vote on non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the organization that holds your shares does not receive instructions from you on how to vote your shares on a non-routine matter, the organization that holds your shares will inform the inspector of election that it does not have the authority to vote on this matter with respect to your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is generally referred to as a broker non-vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Which ballot measures are considered routine or non-routine?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ratification of the appointment of PwC as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year ending December 31, 2017 (Proposal No. 4) is considered a routine matter under applicable rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker or other nominee may generally vote on routine matters, and therefore no broker non-votes are expected to exist in connection with Proposal No. 4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The election of directors (Proposal No. 1), the advisory approval of the compensation of our Named Executive Officers (Proposal No. 2), the advisory vote on the frequency of the advisory vote on compensation of our Named Executive Officers (Proposal No. 3), the approval of the amendment and restatement of the 2000 Employee Stock Purchase Plan (Proposal No. 5), and the approval of the amendment and restatement of our 2010 Incentive Award Plan (Proposal No. 6) are matters considered non-routine under applicable rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker or other nominee cannot vote without instructions on non-routine matters, and therefore there may be broker non-votes on these three proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the voting requirement to approve each of the proposals?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposal No. 1, each director must be elected by the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast with respect to such director by the shares present in person or represented by proxy at the Annual Meeting and entitled to vote on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that the number of votes cast FOR a director must exceed the number of votes cast AGAINST that director, with abstentions and broker non-votes not counted as votes cast as either FOR or AGAINST such directors election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of Proposal No. 2, No. 3, No. 4, No. 5, and No. 6 require the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy at the Annual Meeting and entitled to vote on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposal No. 3, if none of the frequency alternatives (one year, two years or three years) receive a majority vote, we will consider the frequency that receives the highest number of votes by stockholders to be the frequency that has been selected by stockholders, on an advisory basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are abstentions and broker non-votes treated?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares represented by proxies that reflect abstentions or broker non-votes will be counted as shares that are present and entitled to vote for purposes of determining the presence of a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares voted ABSTAIN on proposals other than Proposal No. 1 or Proposal No. 3 will have the same effect as voting against the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers, banks, and other nominees have the power to vote without receiving voting instructions from the owner on Proposal No. 4, so the Company expects no broker non-votes on this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposal No. 1, No. 2, No. 3, No. 5, and No. 6, broker non-votes are not deemed to be entitled to vote for purposes of determining whether stockholder approval of a matter has been obtained.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, broker non-votes are not included in the tabulation of voting results for these proposals for purposes of determining whether proposals have been approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to minimize the number of broker non-votes, the Company encourages you to provide voting instructions to the organization that holds your shares by carefully following instructions provided on the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I change my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy at any time before it is actually voted at the Annual Meeting by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: delivering written notice of revocation to our Corporate Secretary at 1020 Kifer Road, Sunnyvale, California 94086;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: submitting a later dated proxy; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: attending the Annual Meeting and voting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your attendance at the Annual Meeting will not, by itself, constitute revocation of your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also be represented by another person present at the Annual Meeting by executing a form of proxy designating that person to act on your behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares may only be voted by or on behalf of the record holder of shares as indicated in our stock transfer records.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial stockholder but your shares are held of record by another person, such as a stock brokerage firm or bank, that person must vote the shares as the record holder in accordance with the beneficial holders instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who bears the cost of proxy solicitation and who is soliciting proxies on our behalf?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will bear the expense of soliciting proxies, including the expense of preparing, printing and mailing this proxy statement and the proxies we solicit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies will be solicited by mail, telephone, personal contact and electronic means.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have retained Mackenzie Partners, Inc. to solicit proxies for a fee of $12,000 plus a reasonable amount to cover out-of-pocket expenses for proxy solicitation services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies may also be solicited by our directors, officers, and employees in person, by the Internet, by telephone or by fax, without additional remuneration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Copies of proxy materials and our 2016 Annual Report will be supplied to brokers and other nominees for the purpose of soliciting proxies from beneficial owners, and we will reimburse such brokers or other nominees for their reasonable expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who will serve as the inspector of election?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A representative from Computershare will serve as the inspector of election to determine whether or not a quorum is present and to tabulate votes cast by proxy or in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where can I find the voting results of the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The preliminary voting results will be announced at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The final voting results will be tallied by the inspector of election and published in our current report on Form 8-K within four business days after the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I attend the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance at the Annual Meeting is limited to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Admission to the Annual Meeting will be on a first-come, first- served basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each stockholder may be asked to present valid picture identification such as a drivers license or passport and proof of stock ownership as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The use of cell phones, smartphones, pagers, recording and photographic equipment, and/or computers is not permitted in the meeting rooms at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deadline for receipt of stockholder proposals for 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder who meets the requirements of the proxy rules under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the Exchange Act), may submit to the Board proposals to be considered for submission to the stockholders at the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to be considered for inclusion in the proxy material to be disseminated by the Board, your proposal must comply with the requirements of Rule 14a-8 under the Exchange Act and be submitted in writing by notice delivered or mailed by first-class United States mail, postage prepaid, to our Corporate Secretary at:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Intuitive Surgical, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attn: Corporate Secretary 1020 Kifer Road Sunnyvale, CA 94086-5301
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and must be received no later than November 9, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your notice must include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: your name and address and the text of the proposal to be introduced;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the number of shares of stock you hold of record, beneficially own and represent by proxy as of the date of your notice; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a representation that you intend to appear in person or by proxy at the Annual Meeting to introduce the proposal specified in your notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chairperson of the meeting may refuse to acknowledge the introduction of your proposal if it is not made in compliance with the foregoing procedures or the applicable provisions of our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws also provide for separate notice procedures to recommend a person for nomination as a director or to propose business to be considered by stockholders at a meeting outside the processes of Rule 14a-8.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be considered timely under these provisions, the stockholders notice must be received by our Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices at the address set forth above no earlier than December 21, 2017, and no later than January 22, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the date of our 2018 Annual Meeting is more than 30 days before or more than 60 days after April 20, 2018, the stockholders notice must be received not later than the 90th day prior to such annual meeting or, if later, the 10th day following the day on which public announcement of the date of such annual meeting was first made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholder providing such notice must also further update and supplement such notice so that the information provided or required to be provided is true and correct as of the record date for the meeting and as of the date that is 10 business days prior to the meeting or any adjournment or postponement thereof, and such update and supplement must be received by our Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices not later than 5 business days after the record date for the meeting (in the case of the update and supplement required to be made as of the record date) and not later than 8 business days prior to the date for the meeting or, if practicable, any adjournment or postponement thereof (and, if not practicable, on the first practicable date prior to the date to which the meeting has been adjourned or postponed) (in the case of the update and supplement required to be made as of 10 business days prior to the meeting or any adjournment or postponement thereof).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws also specify requirements as to the form and content of a stockholders notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recommend that any stockholder wishing to make a nomination for director or to bring any other item before an annual meeting, other than proposals intended to be included in the proxy materials pursuant to Rule 14a-8, review a copy of our Bylaws, as amended and restated to date, which can be found at www.intuitivesurgical.com or, without charge, from our Corporate Secretary at the address above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Bylaws permit certain of our stockholders who have beneficially owned 3% or more of our outstanding common stock continuously for at least three years to submit nominations to be included in the our proxy materials for up to 25% of the total number of directors then serving.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of proxy access director nominations for the 2018 annual meeting of stockholders must be delivered to our Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices at the address noted above no earlier than December 21, 2017 and no later than the close of business on January 22, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice must set forth the information required by our Bylaws with respect to each proxy access director nomination that an eligible stockholder or stockholders intend to present at the 2018 annual meeting of stockholders and must otherwise be in compliance with our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTORS AND CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has nine authorized seats.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. George J. Stalk, Jr. has informed the Company of his decision to retire and will not seek re-election at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Jami Dover Nachtsheim and all of the existing directors, except Mr. Stalk, have been nominated for election at the Annual Meeting to serve a one-year term expiring at the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders or until a successor has been elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In December 2016, the Board adopted an amendment and restatement of Companys amended and restated bylaws (the Bylaws) to implement additional proxy access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article III, Section 5(e) was added to permit a stockholder, or group of up to 20 stockholders, owning 3% or more of Companys common stock continuously for at least three years to nominate and include in Companys proxy materials for an annual meeting of stockholders, director candidates constituting up to 25% of the Board, provided that the stockholder (or group) and each nominee satisfy the requirements specified in the Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws provide for a majority voting standard in uncontested elections of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As such, in an election where the number of nominees for director does not exceed the number of directors to be elected, a nominee for a director will be elected to the Board if the number of shares voted for the nominee exceeds the number of shares voted against the nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The majority voting standard would not apply, however, if the number of nominees for director exceeds the number of directors to be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that case, the nominees receiving the highest number of affirmative votes of the shares entitled to vote at the meeting would be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The majority voting standard will apply to the election taking place at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consequently, in order to be elected, a nominee must receive more for votes than against votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies may not be voted for more than the nine nominees, and stockholders may not cumulate votes in the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event any nominee is unable or declines to serve as a director at the time of the meeting, the proxies will be voted for such nominee, if any, as may be designated by the Board to fill the vacancy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the date of this Proxy Statement, the Board is not aware that any nominee is unable or will decline to serve as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is currently composed of a group of leaders with broad and diverse experience in many fields, including: management of large global enterprises, technology and innovation leadership, and healthcare.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In these positions, they have also gained industry knowledge and significant and diverse management experience, including with respect to strategic and financial planning, public company financial reporting, compliance, risk management, and leadership development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many of the directors also have experience serving as executive officers, or on boards of directors and board committees of other public companies, and have an understanding of corporate governance practices and trends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other directors have significant academic and research experience and bring unique perspectives to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The biographies below describe the skills, qualities, attributes, and experiences of each of the directors that, among other things, led the Board to recommend them for election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance and Nominating Committee of the Board and the Board believe the skills, qualities, attributes, and experiences of its current directors and director nominees provide the Company with business acumen and a diverse range of perspectives to engage each other and management to effectively address the evolving needs of the Company and represent the best interests of the Companys stockholders.

sentences.text: Craig H. Barratt, Ph.D. has been a member of our Board since April 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2017, Barefoot Networks, Inc. announced that it has appointed Dr. Barratt as its President and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He held several different roles at Google, Inc., an Internet company, from June 2013 to January 2017, including Senior Vice President, Access and Energy and Advisor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He previously served as President of Qualcomm Atheros, the networking and connectivity subsidiary of Qualcomm Inc. (Qualcomm), a mobile technology company, from May 2011 to February 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served as President, Chief Executive Officer and a director of Atheros Communications, Inc., a fabless semiconductor company, from 2003 until its 2011 acquisition by Qualcomm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Atheros as Vice President of Technology in 2002, Dr. Barratt held a number of positions at ArrayComm, Inc., a company specializing in multi- antenna signal processing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Barratt holds Ph.D. and Master of Science degrees from Stanford University, as well as a Bachelor of Engineering degree in electrical engineering and a Bachelor of Science degree in pure mathematics and physics from the University of Sydney in Australia.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Barratt is a co-inventor of a number of U.S. patents in fields including wireless communications and medical imaging and has co-authored a book on linear controller design.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Barratts qualifications to serve on our Board include his leadership at various high growth technology companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Michael A. Friedman, M.D. has been a member of our Board of Directors since July 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Friedman currently serves as the Emeritus Cancer Center Director at City of Hope, a leading cancer research, treatment and education institution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Friedman was the President and Chief Executive Officer of City of Hope from May 2003 to December 2013 and holder of the Irell & Manella Cancer Center Directors Distinguished Chair.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Before leading City of Hope, from September 2001 until April 2003, Dr. Friedman held the position of Senior Vice President of Research and Development, Medical and Public Policy, for Pharmacia Corporation and, from July 1999 until September 2001, was a Senior Vice President of Searle, a subsidiary of Monsanto Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 1995 until June 1999, Dr. Friedman served as Deputy Commissioner for Operations for the Food and Drug Administration, and was Acting Commissioner and Lead Deputy Commissioner from 1997 to 1999.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Friedman has also served on the Board of Directors of MannKind Corporation since December 2003, Celgene Corporation since February 2011, and Smith & Nephew plc since April 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Friedman holds a Bachelor of Arts degree, magna cum laude, from Tulane University, and a Doctorate in Medicine from the University of Texas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is board certified in internal medicine and medical oncology.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Friedman brings to the Board extensive operational and leadership experience, including from his service as a deputy and acting commissioner of the FDA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In July 2007, Dr. Guthart was promoted to President and in January 2010, he was appointed as Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that, in February 2006, Dr. Guthart assumed the role of Chief Operating Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His service as the Chief Executive Officer of Intuitive Surgical enables the Board to perform its oversight function with the benefits of managements perspectives on the business.

sentences.text: Board Size
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of authorized directors constituting the full Board is currently set at nine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors evaluates the appropriateness of the size of the Board from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In evaluating the size of the Board, the Board and the Governance and Nominating Committee consider a number of factors, including
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) resignations and retirements from the current Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the availability of appropriate and qualified candidates;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) balancing the desire of having a small enough Board to facilitate deliberations with, at the same time, having a large enough Board to have the diversity of knowledge, experience, skills, and expertise to ensure that the Board and its committees can effectively perform their responsibilities in overseeing the Companys business; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the goal of having an appropriate mix of inside and independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nomination Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance and Nominating Committee identifies director nominees by reviewing the desired experience, mix of skills, and other qualities to assure appropriate Board composition, taking into consideration the current Board members and the specific needs of the Company and the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance and Nominating Committee will consider nominees recommended by stockholders, and any such recommendations should be sent to our Corporate Secretary in writing at our executive offices as identified in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such recommendations should comply with the notice and other requirements set forth in our Bylaws, including but not limited to stating the following information:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the name and address of such nominating stockholder and the class or series and number of shares of securities of ou Company that are, directly or indirectly, owned of record or beneficially owned by such stockholder;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: whether the nominating stockholder intends to deliver a proxy statement and form of proxy to elect such nominee;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: interests of the nominating stockholder required to be disclosed under our Bylaws
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: all information relating to such proposed nominee that is required to be disclosed in a proxy statement or other filings required in a contested election (including such proposed nominees written consent to being named in the proxy statement as a nominee and to serving as a director if elected);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a description of all direct and indirect compensation and other material monetary agreements, arrangements and understandings during the past three years, and any other material relationships, between or among any nominating stockholder, on the one hand, and each proposed nominee, his or her respective affiliates and associates, on the other hand; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a completed and signed questionnaire, representation, and agreement as provided in our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will also request such other information as may reasonably be required to determine the eligibility of such proposed nominee o serve as an independent director or that could be material to a reasonable stockholders understanding of the independence or lack of ndependence of such proposed nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any recommendations received from stockholders will be evaluated in the same manner as potential nominees suggested by Board members, management, or other parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Bylaws permit certain of our stockholders who have beneficially owned 3% or more of our outstanding common stock continuously for at least three years to submit nominations to be included in our proxy materials for up to 25% of the total number of directors then serving.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of proxy access director nominations for the 2018 annual meeting of stockholders must be delivered to our Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices no earlier than December 21, 2017 and no later than January 22, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice must be set forth the information required by our Bylaws with respect to each proxy access director nomination that an eligible stockholder or stockholders intend to present at the 2018 annual meeting of stockholders and must otherwise be in
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: compliance with our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance and Nominating Committee evaluates director candidates based upon a number of criteria, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the desired experience, mix of skills, and other qualities to assure appropriate Board composition, taking into account the current Board members and the specific needs of the Company and the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the experience, knowledge, skills, and expertise of candidates, which may include experience in management, finance, marketing and accounting, across a broad range of industries with particular emphasis on healthcare and medical device industries, along with experience operating at a policy-making level in an appropriate business, financial, governmental, educational, non-profit, technological or global field;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: diversity of backgrounds and perspectives, including those backgrounds and perspectives with respect to business experience, professional expertise, age, gender and ethnic background;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: personal and professional integrity, character and business judgment of candidates; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: whether candidates are independent, including as determined by the independence requirements of the SEC and the NASDAQ Stock Market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance and Nominating Committee assesses the effectiveness of its approach to consideration of Board candidates as part of its evaluation of the Boards composition to ensure that the Board reflects the knowledge, experience, skills, expertise, and diversity required for the Board to fulfill its duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Responsibilities and Corporate Governance Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards primary responsibility is to exercise their business judgment in the best interests of the Company and its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board selects the Chief Executive Officer of the Company, monitors managements and the Companys performance, and provides advice and counsel to management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other things, the Board at least annually reviews the Companys long-term strategy, long-term business plan, and an annual budget for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also reviews and approves transactions in accordance with guidelines that the Board may adopt from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fulfilling the Boards responsibilities, directors have full access to the Companys management, external auditors, and outside advisors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to the Boards role in risk oversight of the Company, the Board discusses the Companys risk exposures and risk management of various parts of the business, including appropriate guidelines and policies to minimize business risks and major financial risks and the steps management has undertaken to control them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has also adopted Corporate Governance Guidelines to assist the Board in the exercise of its responsibilities and to serve the interests of our Company and our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These guidelines serve as a framework for, among other things, the composition and selection of members of the Board, director orientation and continuing education, responsibilities of directors, conduct of Board meetings, structure and conduct of Board committees, succession planning and oversight of risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines are available on our website at www.intuitivesurgical.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company is focused on its corporate governance practices and values independent board oversight as an essential component of strong corporate performance to enhance stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our commitment to independent oversight is demonstrated by the fact that all of our directors, except our President and Chief Executive Officer, are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, all of the members of our Boards committees are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors acts independently of management and regularly holds independent director sessions of the Board without members of management present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Smith is the Chairman of our Board of Directors, and Dr. Guthart is our President and Chief Executive Officer, as well as a member of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors has determined that the separation of the roles of Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer is appropriate at this time as it allows our Chief Executive Officer to focus primarily on management responsibilities and corporate strategy, while allowing our Chairman to focus on leadership of the Board, providing feedback and advice to the Chief Executive Officer and providing a channel of communication between the Board members and the Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board presides over all Board meetings and works with the Chief Executive Officer to develop agendas for Board meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman advises the Chief Executive Officer and other members of senior management on business strategy and leadership development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also works with the Board to drive decisions about particular strategies and policies and, in concert with the independent Board committees, facilitates a performance evaluation process of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since April 2013, Dr. Alan J. Levy, has served as our Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director is elected annually by a majority of the independent directors upon receiving a recommendation from the Governance and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director's responsibilities include, among others:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: presiding at meetings of the Board at which the Chairman is not present, including executive sessions of the independent directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: providing feedback from executive sessions of the independent directors to the Chairman, the Companys Chief Executive
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Officer and other senior management;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: consulting with the Chairman as to an appropriate schedule of Board meetings;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving meeting agendas for the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: advising the Chairman as to the quality, quantity, and timeliness of the information submitted by the Companys management that is necessary or appropriate for the independent directors to effectively and responsibly perform their duties; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Committees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has established an Audit Committee, a Compensation Committee, and a Governance and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board and its committees set schedules to meet throughout the year and also can hold special meetings and act by written consent from time to time, as appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has delegated various responsibilities and authority to the Audit Committee, Compensation Committee, and Governance and Nominating Committees as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These committees regularly report on their activities and actions to the full Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of these committees of our Board of Directors has a written charter approved by our Board which is available on our website at www.intuitivesurgical.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors from time to time establishes additional committees to address specific needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, our Board of Directors held six meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Four meetings had all members of the Board of Directors attending.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Two members of the Board of Directors attended five out of the six meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members of the Board and its committees also consulted informally with management from time to time and acted at various times by written consent without a meeting during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee assists the full Board in its general oversight of our financial reporting, internal controls, and audit functions, and is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, and oversight of the work of our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviews and discusses with management and our independent registered public accounting firm the annual audited and quarterly financial statements (including the related disclosures under Managements Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations in our annual report on Form 10-K and our quarterly reports on Form 10-Q), reviews the integrity of the financial reporting processes, both internal and external, reviews the qualifications, performance and independence of our registered public accounting firm, and prepares the Audit Committee Report included in our Proxy Statement in accordance with rules and regulations of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The responsibilities and activities of the Audit Committee are described in further detail in the Audit Committee Report in this proxy statement and the Audit Committees charter, a copy of which can be found on our website at www.intuitivesurgical.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that all of the Audit Committee members meet the independence and experience requirements of the NASDAQ Stock Market and the SEC and that Mr. Rubash is an audit committee financial expert as defined under applicable rules of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Audit Committee met nine times.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Three members of the Audit Committee attended all meetings while serving on the Audit Committee and one member attended seven of the nine meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Governance and Nominating Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance and Nominating Committee is responsible for matters relating to the corporate governance of our Company and the nomination of members of the Board, the Lead Director, and committees thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that all of the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Governance and Nominating Committee members meet the independence requirements of the NASDAQ Stock Market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: responsibilities and activities of the Governance and Nominating Committee are described in the Governance and Nominating Committee charter, a copy of which can be found on our website at www.intuitivesurgical.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Governance and Nominating Committee met three times.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All three members of the Governance and Nominating Committee attended all three meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee reviews and approves all compensation programs applicable to executive officers of the Company, including salaries, bonuses and stock compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee reviews and approves corporate goals and objectives relevant to the compensation of the Companys Chief Executive Officer, evaluates the performance of the Chief Executive Officer in light of those goals and objectives, and sets the Chief Executive Officers compensation level based on this evaluation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee approves any new compensation plan or any material change to an existing compensation plan whether or not subject to stockholder approval and makes recommendations to the Board with respect to the Companys incentive compensation plans and equity-based plans subject to stockholder approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee reviews and discusses with management the disclosure regarding executive compensation and inclusion of the Compensation Discussion and Analysis (CD&A) included in our annual proxy statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that all of the Compensation Committee members meet the independence requirements of the NASDAQ Stock Market and the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Compensation Committee met three times and all members of the Compensation Committee attended those meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee operates under a charter that can be found on our website at www.intuitivesurgical.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, during 2016, none of our officers had an interlock relationship, as that term is defined by the SEC.

sentences.text: The Company reimburses its non-employee directors for all reasonable out-of-pocket expenses incurred in the performance of their duties as directors of the Company.

sentences.text: Annual cash compensation: During 2016, the non-employee members of the Board received the following cash compensation: (1) an annual retainer for the Chairman of the Board of $110,000 and an annual retainer for each other member of the Board of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: $60,000; (2) additional annual retainers for services as a committee chairperson ($23,000 for Audit Committee, $20,000 for Compensation Committee, and $13,000 for Governance and Nominating Committee); and (3) additional annual retainers for services as a committee member ($10,000 for Audit Committee, $6,000 for Compensation Committee, and $4,000 for Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity Compensation: The terms of the Directors Plan provide for automatic non-discretionary grants of stock options to our non- employee directors, and the terms of the Incentive Plan provide discretionary authority to our Board of Directors to grant equity awards, including RSUs, to our non-employee directors, and to determine the number of shares of our common stock underlying, and the other terms and conditions of, such awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The table below sets forth the annual equity awards granted to our non-employee directors at the 2016 Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors   2016 RSU Value (1)   2016 Stock Option Value (2) Chairman of the Board  $ 285,000  $ 95,000 Lead Director  $ 247,500  $ 82,500 Members of the Board  $ 210,000  $ 70,000
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) The number of RSUs granted is determined by taking the RSU Value and dividing by the closing trading price of the Companys common stock reported by NASDAQ on the date of grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) The number of shares underlying the options granted to purchase the Company's common stock is determined by taking the Stock Option Value and dividing by one-third of the closing trading price of the Companys common stock reported by NASDAQ on the date of grant; provided that in no event shall the number of shares underlying the option exceed the number of shares underlying the 2015 annual option grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The equity grants vest fully on the earlier of first anniversary of the date of grant or the next annual meeting of stockholders, subject to continued service through such vesting date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: New non-employee directors receive a pro-rated equity grant based on the number of months remaining between appointment date and the expected date of the next annual grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2017, the total value of the equity compensation to the Chairman of the Board was decreased by $50,000 to $330,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The equity compensation program for our non-employee directors for 2017 is otherwise similar to the program described above for 2016, except that the non-employee directors will receive fifty percent (50%) of the value of their equity award to be granted in the form of RSUs, with RSUs valued based on the closing trading price of our common stock on the date of grant, and fifty percent (50%) of the value of their equity awards granted in the form of options to purchase our common stock, with options to purchase common stock valued based on one-third (1/3) of the closing trading price of our common stock on the date of grant, provided that in no event shall the number of shares underlying the option exceed the number of shares underlying the 2015 annual option grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Guidelines: We believe that stock ownership by the members of the Board is important to link the risks and rewards inherent in stock ownership of these individuals and our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2015, the Board adopted director stock ownership guidelines that require each non-employee director to maintain beneficial ownership of shares of our common stock with a value equal to four times his or her aggregate annual cash retainer for serving as a member of the Board, not including any meeting fees, incentive awards, or committee, chair or other similar retainers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These mandatory ownership guidelines are intended to create a clear standard that encourages directors to remain invested in the performance of our stock price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the purposes of determining stock ownership levels, the following forms of equity interests in our Company are included: shares owned outright by, or held in trust for the benefit of, the director or his or her spouse or children; shares held through a fund or other entity as to which the director has control; shares of our common stock, stock units or other stock equivalents obtained through the exercise of stock options or vesting of Company equity awards; vested equity awards granted under our equity plans; and other stock or stock equivalent awards determined by the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each non-management director has five years from the date he or she becomes subject to the stock ownership guidelines to come into compliance with the guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Salvatore J. Brogna joined Intuitive Surgical as Director, Mechanical Engineering, in October 1999 and was promoted to Vice President, Engineering in July 2005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In August 2010, Mr. Brogna was appointed as Senior Vice President, Product Development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In June 2015, Mr. Brogna was promoted to the position of Executive Vice President, Product Operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Intuitive Surgical, Mr. Brogna led design and development of complex robotic systems at Adept Technology and at Unimation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Brogna is a graduate of Clarkson University where he earned a B.S. and an M.S. in Mechanical Engineering.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: David J. Rosa joined Intuitive Surgical in March 1996 and has held leadership positions in engineering, clinical development, marketing and product development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In April 2011, Mr. Rosa was promoted to the position of Senior Vice President, Emerging Procedures & Technology and transitioned to the position of Senior Vice President, Scientific Affairs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In August 2014, Mr. Rosa was promoted to the position of Executive Vice President and Chief Scientific Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In June 2015, Mr. Rosa was appointed as Executive Vice President and Chief Commercial Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Intuitive Surgical, Mr. Rosa contributed to the development of trans- esophageal transducers for Acuson Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Rosa graduated magna cum laude with a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering from California Polytechnic University at San Luis Obispo.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also holds a Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering from Stanford University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Myriam J. Curet, M.D. joined Intuitive Surgical in December 2005 as Chief Medical Advisor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2014, Dr. Curet was promoted to the position of Senior Vice President, Chief Medical Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Curet also held a faculty position as Professor of Surgery at Stanford University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since October 2010, she has served as a Consulting Professor of Surgery at Stanford University with a part time clinical appointment at the Palo Alto Veteran's Administration Medical Center.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Curet received her M.D. from Harvard Medical School and completed her general surgery residency program at the University of Chicago.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She then worked for the Indian Health Service for four years before finishing her Surgical Endoscopy fellowship at the University of New Mexico.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She was on the faculty at the University of New Mexico for six years prior to joining the Stanford University Department of Surgery in 2000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mark J. Meltzer joined Intuitive Surgical in December 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Intuitive Surgical, Mr. Meltzer served as General Counsel of FoxHollow Technologies Inc. ("FoxHollow") from October 2004 to December 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to FoxHollow, Mr. Meltzer served as General Counsel for Epicor Medical Inc. and Ventritex Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Meltzer graduated cum laude from UC Berkeley with a B.S. in Electrical Engineering.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He received his J.D. from UC Hastings where he served on the law review.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Meltzer, a registered patent attorney, was appointed as a special master in federal court where he assisted in the evaluation and administration of complex patent cases.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Meltzer has tried cases to juries and has argued before the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His pro bono work has included the representation of indigents and non-profits before courts and administrative agencies and volunteer service in federal anti-poverty programs.

sentences.text: Marshall L. Mohr joined Intuitive Surgical in March 2006.

sentences.text: Compensation Discussion and Analysis
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Compensation Discussion and Analysis discusses the principles underlying our executive compensation program and the policies and practices that contributed to our executive compensation actions and decisions for 2016, and what we believe to be the most important factors relevant to an analysis of these policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also provides qualitative information regarding the manner and context in which compensation was paid to, awarded to and earned by our Named Executive Officers (as described below) and places in perspective the data presented in the compensation tables and accompanying narrative below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Compensation Discussion and Analysis provides information about the material components of our executive compensation program for the following executive officers, to whom we refer collectively in this discussion as our Named Executive Officers:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gary S. Guthart, Ph.D., our President and Chief Executive Officer;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Salvatore J. Brogna, our Executive Vice President, Product Operations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: David J. Rosa, our Executive Vice President and Chief Commercial Officer;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mark J. Meltzer, our Senior Vice President, General Counsel, and Chief Compliance Officer; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Marshall L. Mohr, our Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, this Compensation Discussion and Analysis provides an overview of our executive compensation philosophy, the overall objectives of our executive compensation program, and each compensation component that we provide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we explain how and why the Compensation Committee of our Board (the Compensation Committee) arrived at the specific compensation decisions for our executive officers during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary objective of our executive compensation program is to attract and retain a talented, entrepreneurial, and creative team of executives who will provide leadership to make surgery more effective, less invasive, and easier on surgeons, patients, and their families.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We seek to accomplish this goal in a way that is aligned with the long-term interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee oversees our executive compensation program and determines the compensation of our executive officers, including our Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our executive compensation program effectively aligns the interests of our Named Executive Officers with our objective of creating sustainable long-term value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Financial Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we continued to grow the number of procedures performed worldwide using our products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the U.S., the procedure growth was largely attributable to growth in general surgery procedures as well as moderate growth in more mature gynecologic and urologic procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: International procedure growth was primarily driven by growth in prostatectomy as well as earlier stage growth in kidney cancer procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
